statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT agency_id, industry_id, renewable_energy_production, compliance_status FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT agency_id, compliance_status, industry_id, renewable_energy_production FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT agency_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE renewable_energy_production > 1000;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring ORDER BY agency_id DESC;
SELECT agency_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE renewable_energy_production > 100 ORDER BY renewable_energy_production ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE industry_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT industry_id, compliance_status, renewable_energy_production FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE agency_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT industry_id FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT id, company_name, energy_source FROM ComplianceMonitoring ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyRegulations WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT industry_affected, regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM RenewableEnergyRegulations ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY company_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, industry, energy_source FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND industry = 'Renewable Energy' ORDER BY energy_source ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, energy_usage FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE energy_usage > 1000 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, industry_affected, regulatory_body FROM RenewableEnergyRegulations WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyRegulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%carbon%' ORDER BY regulation_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_compliance;
SELECT industry_id, compliance_date FROM renewable_energy_compliance;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM government_agencies;
SELECT * FROM industry_data WHERE renewable_energy_capacity > 100;
SELECT id, industry_name, renewable_energy_capacity FROM industry_data ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_compliance WHERE compliance_date = '2022-06-15' ORDER BY industry_id DESC;
SELECT industry_name, renewable_energy_capacity FROM industry_data WHERE renewable_energy_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY renewable_energy_capacity ASC;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name LIKE '%energy%' ORDER BY agency_name;
SELECT id, compliance_date FROM renewable_energy_compliance WHERE industry_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM industry_data WHERE renewable_energy_capacity < 5000 ORDER BY industry_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Companies;
SELECT company_name, industry_type FROM Energy_Companies WHERE renewable_energy_production > 0;
SELECT * FROM Renewable_Energy_Policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%renewable%';
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM Energy_Companies JOIN Compliance_Reports ON Energy_Companies.company_id = Compliance_Reports.company_id;

SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS num_companies FROM Government_Agencies JOIN Energy_Companies ON Government_Agencies.agency_type = Energy_Companies.industry_type GROUP BY agency_name ORDER BY num_companies DESC;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Companies;
SELECT company_name, industry_type FROM Energy_Companies ORDER BY industry_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND report_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT c.company_name, p.policy_name, r.compliance_status FROM Energy_Companies c JOIN Compliance_Reports r ON c.company_id = r.company_id JOIN Renewable_Energy_Policies p ON r.policy_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT a.agency_name, count(r.report_id) as total_reports FROM Government_Agencies a LEFT JOIN Compliance_Reports r ON a.agency_id = r.company_id GROUP BY a.agency_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT id, policy_name, policy_description FROM renewable_energy_policies;
SELECT agency_name, agency_contact, agency_location FROM government_agencies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT industry_name, industry_description FROM industry_details WHERE industry_location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT industry_id, policy_id, compliance_status FROM industry_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM renewable_energy_policies WHERE industry_id = 1;
SELECT industry_name, industry_description, industry_location FROM industry_details ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_reports WHERE compliance_level > 75 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT agency_name, agency_contact FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_location = 'USA';
